title: USMNT's Untimely Funk
description:
The FC crew recap the United States continuing their poor form ahead of the World Cup and question whether Gregg Berhalter can inspire his side to better performances comes November. Plus, Mark Ogden defends Harry Maguire's position in the England squad despite facing heavy criticism, Alvaro Morata scores a late winner against Portugal to win their Nations League group, and Brazil showcase their amazing attacking talent against Tunisia.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: The USMNT continue their poor form in last game prior to World Cup; Harry Maguire criticized for England performance; Brazil showcase their attacking best
